articles.description: Serena Williams says she would have been banned for 20 years had she committed a doping offence similar to that of men's player Jannik Sinner.

articles.description: Ukrainian Lesia Tsurenko says she will "seek justice in court" after being subjected to "moral abuse" by a WTA executive.
articles.title: Lesia Tsurenko: Ukrainian to take legal action after WTA 'moral abuse'
